name: Back Stabbers
description:
Back Stabbers is a fan game inspired by Windjammers, a game made by Data East and recently Dotemu. Try it on Arcade, Neo Geo, Playstation 4 and Switch. It's Awesome!

At first, I just wanted to be able to play Windjammers on mobile with a friend. That's pretty much it...

  • Solo or Local Multiplayer
  • Easy to learn, hard to master gameplay
  • 6 unique characters
  • 6 unique maps
  • Multiple challenges and game modes
  • Totally FREE
  • You can even remove the (non intrusive) ads for FREE
  • This app doesn't care who you are, does not sell your data, and loves you in a general basis <3
  • Youtube
  • Facebook
  • Twitter
